aboutUs.title: About Me
aboutUs.paragraph1: I am Pablo, Argentine, born on August 12, 1988 in the city of Buenos Aires. Living in Balneário Camboriú, in the state of Santa Catarina, since the beginning of 2022. I moved here in search of quality of life and new horizons in an incredible city for it's beaches and lifestyle.
aboutUs.paragraph2: I am a Front-End Programmer, passionate about personal and professional growth and development in the IT world. Responsible, self-taught, proactive, determined and restless are the qualities that characterize me. I like to work as a team so that learning is faster and shared.
aboutUs.paragraph3: I have been working as a freelance developer since 2019 and I use technologies such as ReactJS, Javascript, Bootstrap, JQuery, CSS3, HTML5; GitHub for version control and collaborative work; and Firebase. I also manage tools related to digital marketing such as Google Ads, Google Tag Manager and Google Analytics.
